tool_description: Our Image Upscaler API uses advanced machine learning algorithms to enhance the resolution and quality of your images, making them sharper, clearer, and more detailed. With our API, you can easily upscale your images in real-time, saving time and effort while achieving stunning results. Whether you're a photographer, designer, or content creator, our Image Upscaler API can help you enhance your visuals and take your work to the next level.
name: AI Picture Upscaler
title: AI Picture Upscaler

api_list.name: Photo Upscaler
api_list.description:
Information about some parametres.

 - `image` set Image file as binary

 - `sizeFactor` is the new size of image. It would be `2`, `4`, `8`, `10`  and is measured as a multiple. For instance, it converts 200x350 to 400x700 px for `2` value

 - `noiseCancellationFactor` must be `0`

 - `imageStyle` must  be `default`

utterances.utterance: Can you enhance this photo by doubling its size while keeping the noise cancellation off and using the default style?
Please upscale this image by a factor of four with no noise reduction and the standard image style.
I want to increase the resolution of this picture eight times, keeping noise cancellation disabled and using the default enhancement style.
Could you please enlarge this image by ten times with noise cancellation set to zero and the default style applied?
I'd like to upscale this photo to twice its original size, without any noise cancellation and using the default image style.
Please make this image four times larger, keep noise cancellation off, and apply the default style.
Can you upscale this picture by a factor of eight with noise cancellation disabled and the default enhancement style?
I need this image enlarged ten times, no noise cancellation, and the default style should be used.
Could you double the size of this photo with noise cancellation off and keep the default image style?
Please upscale this image by four times, ensure noise cancellation is zero, and use the default style.
